rows.label: qev086501_MSG0001
rows.name: Mr. Mustache is here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0002
rows.name: Right, got a new mission for ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0003
rows.name: Tatsu happy to take request under consideration. After dinner.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0004
rows.name: Quiet down, turnip.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0005
rows.name:
The commander's here to talk important business—
this doesn't have anything to do with you, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0006
rows.name:
Well, actually, it does. In fact, hash brown here
is the lynchpin to this assignment.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0007
rows.name: What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0008
rows.name: A mission that relies on Tatsu? What's the job?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0009
rows.name: Basically, we want him to act as an emissary for us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0010
rows.name: Commissary? Sound delicious. Tatsu accept![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0011
rows.name: He's not talking about food, dummy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0012
rows.name:
It means to represent us to some other group—
to act as an ambassador, on our behalf.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0013
rows.name:
Aha! So friends choose Tatsu as most charming
and attractive example of New LA residents![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0014
rows.name: Well, mostly it's 'cause we need to talk with your mama.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0015
rows.name: Oh, this is just for the Nopon?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0016
rows.name:
Hey now, don't sell those little critters short.
The Nopon would make a crucial strategic ally.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_JNK0010
rows.name: Assume

rows.label: qev086501_SEL0011
rows.name: Say it's because they're a powerful economic force.

rows.label: qev086501_JNK0020
rows.name: Indulge

rows.label: qev086501_SEL0021
rows.name: Say it's because they're SOOOO cute!

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0017
rows.name: Exactly.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0018
rows.name:
They deal in materials from well outside our reach,
AND they trade with other races we don't.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0019
rows.name:
Not to mention, their caravans bring in all kinds
of news and info that we don't have access to here in NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0020
rows.name:
Right? You wouldn't think it from looking at Tatsu,
but Nopon kids are SO! Adorable![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0021
rows.name:
They have their appeal, I suppose. Boppin' around with those
wee little nubs they have for hands and feet or whatever...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0022
rows.name: And those big eyes that—okay, that's not the point here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0023
rows.name:
Point is they play a critical role in trade
and the whole economy here on Mira.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0024
rows.name: It's true, they're skilled merchants.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0025
rows.name:
I'm sure sooner or later we'll need their cooperation
if we want to build a unified Miran society.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0026
rows.name: That's right.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0027
rows.name:
We can use all the know-how they have from interacting with
the different tribes could help us keep everyone together.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0028
rows.name: Tatsu get a bit lost at the end there...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0029
rows.name:
But understood parts about how great
and awesome Nopon people are![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0030
rows.name:
Er, right. Anyway, we'd be happy to host any
Nopon inclined to move to New LA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0031
rows.name:
And we'd like YOU to be the one to propose
this new alliance. Understand?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0032
rows.name: Sounds like we're going to see Koko.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0033
rows.name: Yup, but that's just one stop on this little goodwill tour.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0034
rows.name:
I know you're already familiar with the
Dodonga Caravan over in Noctilum...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0035
rows.name: Then I also need you to visit the Dorian Caravan in Oblivia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0036
rows.name: Got it![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0037
rows.name: Take 'em in whatever order you like.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0038
rows.name: Chausson drafted a treaty for you to give the caravan leaders.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0039
rows.name:
See if you can't get them to sign on as allies.
We're countin' on ya.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev086501_MSG0040
rows.name: No problem for Tatsu![ST:wait ]
